missing.game.world.nodes

Interface WorldTile.TileObject

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    Bag, Bush, Character, Consumable, Container, Cooking, Craftable, Dirt, Fireplace, FishArea, Foliage, Food, Furniture, Health, Interactable, Item, Merchant, Money, Movable, NonInteractable, NonMovable, Player, Pocket, Resource, Rock, Shop, Soil, Source, Stone, TallGrass, Tool, Tree, Usable, Wood, WorldTile.Pile
    Enclosing class:
    WorldTile

    public static interface WorldTile.TileObject
    This interface represents all objects which can be stored inside the WorldTile.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Interface and Description
      static class  WorldTile.TileObject.Direction
      This enumeration should be used to represent where the object is facing or where the object can be approached from.

    • Method Summary

      • performAction

        void performAction(Player player)
            throws GameException,
                   SignalException
        Performs the default action for the specified item. If the item is a movable object, then the player picks that item up. If the item is interactable, then it allows the user to perform special actions such as cook food or collect resources.
        Parameters:
        player -
        Throws:
        GameException
        SignalException
